keyTakeAways: Nicholas Rossi, 38, was convicted of raping two women in northern Utah in 2008 and sentenced to five years to life in prison.
Rossi allegedly faked his death in 2020 and fled the U.S., using aliases including Arthur Knight, and was eventually identified through a DNA match from a decade-old rape kit.
Rossi was arrested in Scotland in 2023 after hospital staff recognized his tattoos from an Interpol notice.
He was extradited to Utah in January 2024 after a protracted legal battle.
The victim described the trauma of the assault and emphasized the need for accountability and safety, not vengeance.
Rossi maintained his innocence during sentencing, claiming the women were lying and stating he was not guilty.
The case highlights the dangers of rape kit backlogs and the importance of DNA testing in solving cold cases.
Rossi used at least a dozen aliases over the years to evade capture and is considered a 'flight risk' and 'serial abuser of women'.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Nicholas Rossi, 38, was sentenced to five years to life in prison after being convicted of raping two women in northern Utah in 2008. Authorities identified him in 2018 through a decade-old DNA rape kit, and he allegedly faked his death in 2020, using aliases like Arthur Knight and evading capture for years. He was arrested in Scotland in 2023 after being recognized by hospital staff through distinctive tattoos, including one from Brown University, linked to an Interpol notice. Rossi, who grew up in Rhode Island and had a history of failing to register as a sex offender, maintained his innocence during sentencing, claiming the victims were lying. The victim described the trauma of the assault and emphasized the need for accountability and safety. The case highlights the dangers of rape kit backlogs and the importance of DNA testing in solving cold cases, as well as the threat posed by individuals who flee justice through deception.
title: Man accused of faking his own death and fleeing the US after rape charges gets at least five years in prison
